text: The description and the code is using a comma to separate paths. The documentation is using a semicolon which results in a very hard to detect error when copying the example. * Example: * /=/Users/slaurent/mywebapp/src/main/webapp;/pictures=/Users/slaurent/sharedpictures * correct is: * Example: * /=/Users/slaurent/mywebapp/src/main/webapp,/pictures=/Users/slaurent/sharedpictures *
creator: wider.stand@gmx.de
knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
Fixed by r1586972 and will be in 7.0.54.

TC 6 and 8 not affected, they do not have this feature.
